channel.title: ski on Mike J. O'Brien
channel.description: Recent content in ski on Mike J. O'Brien

item.title: Fresh Powder at Diamond Peak
item.description: Fresh powder over night and snow everywhere. Unedited and Raw GoPro files from 02/26/2017 at DiamondPeak in Incline Village, Nevada.

item.title: Fresh Powder at Sugarbowl
item.description: Little windy at the peak, but so much snow. Unedited and Raw GoPro files from 01/13/2017 at SugarBowl in Lake Tahoe, CA.
